mention.text: chief of cancer research at Scripps Clinic & Research Foundation , La Jolla , Calif. , where the drug was developed
the most effective treatment for hairy-cell leukemia , in terms of rapidity of response
a cancer researcher at the University of Texas-M.D. Anderson Cancer Center , Houston
a drug sold by Hoffmann-La Roche Inc. and Schering-Plough Corp. and an experimental drug called deoxycoformycin
a staff leukemia doctor at Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center , New York
Ellin Berman , a staff leukemia doctor at Memorial Sloan Kettering Cancer Center , New York
patients -- most of whom had failed other treatments --
